title: Church as Displaced Platform for Formation and Transformation
description:
There are lots of fights in church about who is welcome to participate in the church's hierarchies. This while technology continues to spit out brand new powerful with transformational and formational powers with every passing year. I have never seen much serious attention given to this. The church just keeps fighting its little fights. 

Beth Moore Left the SBC https://religionnews.com/2021/04/05/beth-moore-left-a-denomination-that-had-left-her/
Church decline https://www.christianitytoday.com/news/2021/march/gallup-church-membership-decline-minority-nones-us.html
How Altars work https://youtu.be/4GUw8Lztfuc
Tom Holland Did religion Exist in the ancient world https://youtu.be/ZeCTC_r4vMI
Through the Eye of the Needle Peter Brown https://amzn.to/3cU6Y6k
Fatal Discord https://amzn.to/3fPGMM6

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/pX5qBdUH

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/
